translated: The Discussion of the Analytical Knowledges
Is all knowledge an analytical knowledge?
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

original: Ye keci sammutiṁ jānanti, sabbe te paṭisambhidāpattāti?
analyzed: ye keci sammutim jānanti sabbe te paṭisambhidā pattā ati
translated: “Are all those who know the conventional the possessors of analytical knowledge?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is knowledge of the range of the mind an analytical knowledge?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …
“Is knowledge of the range of the mind an analytical knowledge?”

original: Ye keci paracittaṁ jānanti, sabbe te paṭisambhidāpattāti?
analyzed: ye keci para cittam jānanti sabbe te paṭisambhidā pattā ati
translated: “Are all those who know the minds of others the possessors of analytical knowledge?”
“Is it so that it is not to be said that it is a person who is the same in the eye faculty and the eye consciousness?” …
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

original: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpannassa atthi paññā, sā paññā paṭisambhidāti?
analyzed: pathavīkasiṇam samāpattim samāpannassa atthi paññā sā paññā paṭisambhidā ati
translated: “Is the understanding of one who has attained the earth-kasina jhana an analytical knowledge?”

analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  āpokasiṇam pe  tejaḥ kasiṇam pe
translated: “No, friend.”🔽The base of water …🔽The base of fire …
The base of air …🔽The blue kasiṇa …

analyzed: pīta kasiṇam pe  lohita kasiṇam pe
o dāta kasiṇam pe  ākāsānañcāyatanam pe  viññāṇam ca āyatanam pe
translated: The white kasiṇa …🔽The base of the infinity of space …🔽The base of the infinity of consciousness …
“When giving a gift …🔽When giving a robe …

analyzed: cīvaram dadantassa pe  piṇḍapātam dadantassa pe

original: gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadantassa atthi paññā, sā paññā paṭisambhidāti?🔽Na hevaṁ vattabbe …pe….
analyzed: gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram dadantassa atthi paññā sā paññā paṭisambhidā ati  na ha ivam vattabbe pe
translated: When giving medicinal supplies … is there understanding? Is that understanding a discrimination?”🔽“No, friend.”

original: Atthi lokuttarā paññā, sā paññā na paṭisambhidāti?
analyzed: atthi lokuttarā paññā sā paññā na paṭisambhidā ati
translated: “Is there any supramundane understanding that is not a discrimination?”

original: Na hevaṁ vattabbe …pe…🔽tena hi sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisambhidāti.
analyzed: na ha ivam vattabbe pe  tena hi sabbam ñāṇam paṭisambhidā ati
translated: “No, friend.”🔽“Then all knowledge is a discrimination.”
The Discussion of Discrimination is finished.
